data.DateTime: It works with and returns DateTime objects ::Event : It
data.description: Returns Easter events for DateTime objects
data.similar: Directly related to all DateTime modules
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
DateTime: It works with and returns DateTime objects ::Event : It
    returns information on an event ::Easter: The event it returns
    DateTime info for is Easter (both Western and Eastern(orthodox))h
